name: CHILD'S PLAY (INDIA) FOUNDATION

address: Casa da Moeda, Near Head Post Office,

briefDescription: Child’s Play India Foundation is a registered music education trust that seeks to instill positive values and provide social empowerment to India’s disadvantaged children through the teaching of classical music to the highest possible standard. We currently teach violin, viola, cello, recorder, transverse flute, piano and choir to around 100 children across three locations in Goa.
